history.taskDescription: Your task is to measure the melting point of solid unknown substance C, which is located around the kitchen. First, focus on the thermometer. Next, focus on the solid unknown substance C. If the melting point of solid unknown substance C is above 150.0 degrees celsius, focus on the orange box. If the melting point of solid unknown substance C is below 150.0 degrees celsius, focus on the yellow box. The boxes are located around the kitchen.
